main_definition: in every part of a place or thing; during the whole period of time mentioned.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Over an entire area, space, or duration. For example: 'Trees were scattered throughout the forest.'
meanings_and_examples.example: The sunlight filtered through every corner of the room.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In all areas or sections within a particular context or environment. For example: 'There were clean beaches throughout our vacation destination.'
meanings_and_examples.example: He found his favorite song playing on various radio stations throughout the city.

meanings_and_examples.definition: During the whole course of time or an event. For example: 'Throughout history, humanity has faced numerous challenges.'
meanings_and_examples.example: She remained committed to her fitness routine throughout her entire life.
